entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
